rows.label: qst105604_msg001
rows.name:
A rebellion has occurred. The rebels
are enraged that the truth about
Adel's lineage was kept secret.

rows.label: qst105604_msg002
rows.name:
I'm sorry, but could you eliminate
the rebellious elements?

rows.label: qst105604_msg0001
rows.name: What's goin' on?!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0002
rows.name: Your Highness...!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0003
rows.name:
Some of the soldiers who heard the
rumors about Adel-sama and the
royal family have rebelled...!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0004
rows.name: What did ya say?!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0005
rows.name:
They are clamoring to take
up arms against His Majesty
for concealing the truth!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0006
rows.name: Dammit... I was afraid of this...!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0007
rows.name: Prince! We have to stop them!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0008
rows.name: What's the situation?

rows.label: qst105604_msg0009
rows.name:
The rebellious soldiers are
said to be engaged in skirmishes
throughout the castle!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0010
rows.name:
All units, order! Swiftly suppress
and secure the rebel soldiers!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0011
rows.name: Yes, sir! Understood!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0012
rows.name: Alright, I'm goin' too!

rows.label: qst105604_msg0013
rows.name:
Sorry... for makin' you help
with my family's problems.

rows.label: qst105604_msg0014
rows.name:
I'm your Blade, Prince. The burden
you carry... I'll carry half of it.

rows.label: qst105604_msg0015
rows.name: Saika...

rows.label: qst105604_msg0016
rows.name:
You're stronger than me,
but you'll only take half?

rows.label: qst105604_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh... can't be helped. I'll carry
you and the burden, Prince.

rows.label: qst105604_msg0018
rows.name: Now that's my Blade! Alright, let's go!
